Title: Max Scherzer Secures First Win in Nearly a Year as Blue Jays Edge Athletics 7-6 ⚾
Description: Max Scherzer's first win in nearly a year energized the Blue Jays as they edged the Athletics 7-6. The legendary pitcher struck out eight over six innings, becoming Toronto's oldest pitcher to win since 2015. Vladimir Guerrero Jr. made history with his 1,000th career hit, while Toronto's 13th win in 15 games highlights their dominance. Discover how Scherzer’s return could impact the playoff race—what's next for this rising team?
